task.summary: Can save and load bids and bets. Testability added.
Can save and load bids and bets. Testability added.
Bets now correctly save bids that have been given to them.
Delegated Database responsibilities to new Row/Table classes. Additional persistence.
Created leagues. Leagues can invite members. Users can receive generic 'Requests'.
